comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_Wyoming_(BB-32) A keen, knowledgeable eye might look at the buildings on the right and confirm that this is Philadelphia. Probably the commission date, September 25, 1912.

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: another indication it is commisioning is her sister ship USS Arkansas in front of her, they were commissioned from the same yard in the same month.
